mainData.name: World Clock  helps travel in your workplace.
mainData.descriptionMain: World Clock is the most convenient and fastest way to keep your head clean.
mainData.descriptionLast: Now your time is in your hands.

advantage.title: Simple design.
advantage.text: We managed to create a laconic design with well-placed accents and clear functionality. And you can also have the option to choose a dark theme.

advantage.title: One page app.
advantage.text: We managed to place all the necessary information on one page because it helps to save the user's time so that he feels better.

advantage.title: Quick editing.
advantage.text: You can easily add or remove a city, scroll through the time and select a different date. It is very convenient.

advantage.title: One touch time scroll
advantage.text: We have specially placed the time wheel on the bottom to make it comfortable for both left-handers and right-handers.

advantage.title: Quick sharing
advantage.text: Swiping city to the right - send a quick message to your colleagues and friends about an upcoming event with time and date.

advantage.title: Connection with calendar apps
advantage.text: Swiping to the right, you will enter the data into the calendar so as not to forget anything.
